Tenant.definition: one who holds or possesses property by any kind of right
Tenant.origin: [Anglo-French, from Old French, from present participle of tenir to hold, from Latin tenÄ“re ]

1.1: one who holds or possesses property by any kind of right

2.1: one who holds a tenancy in property

3.1: one who possesses property in exchange for payment of rent see also
